channel.title: Projects on social network analyses and internet-of-things

item.title: Science in Change
item.description: Let me tell you one thing about children. They are never short of questions. "What would a tree say to a car?", my five year old son asked me a few years ago. "Don't hit me?", I suggested, but he insisted that a tree would ask "Don't pollute me, please", as he fortunately never saw a car hit a tree.
